name: 13/002: PinCity Map (Berlin)
description: Mark all the places on that last epic trip to Berlin by pinning them up on the PinCity Berlin map. This beautiful city map is made of felt and can be used as a bulletin board to collect trip ephemera on places you've been, or as an inspiration board to where you want to go! Whether you leave them clean or use them to hold old ticket stubs, photos or souvenirs, this will definitely inspire you to book your next flight out. .: 1 colour available - Blue .: Size: 100cmW x 80cmH .: Material: Printed Polymer Felt on 1/s .: 100% Recyclable and lightweight enough to install with blutack .: Comes with 15 Red Pins .: DOES NOT come with original box .: Washable / Iron on reverse

Whether you leave them clean or use them to hold old ticket stubs, photos or souvenirs, this will definitely inspire you to book your next flight out. .: 2 colours available - Blue and Black .: Size: 130cmW x 70cmH .: Material: Printed Polymer Felt on 1/s .: 100% Recyclable and lightweight enough to install with blutack .: Comes with 15 Red Pins .: DOES NOT come with original box .: Washable / Iron on reverse

name: 12/004: Trunk Notebook Cover
description: I found these notebook covers while walking around the Umeda train station and came across a lovely shop that specialized in all products travel. I loved that they look like mini steamer trunks! Down to the little handle detail on the spine and the map print on each page, there's even a cute ornate key that you can use as a bookmark! I love that as a notebook cover you can reuse it over and over again to cover boring notebooks. Available in 3 colours: - 12/004A: Brown Brown cover with light beige trimming and gold detail, and brown striped interior - 12/004B: Dark Blue Dark blue cover with beige trimming and silver detail, and blue striped interior - 12/004C: White White cover with brown trimming and gold detail, and reddish-brown striped interior .: Notebook cover is 16.5cmH x 25.5cmW when open, fits A6 sized books best .: Cover is made of PU leather and comes with a ribbon bookmark .: Metal key tied on a ribbon as a bookmark

name: 12/003: Trunk Notebook
description: I found these notebooks while walking around the Umeda train station and came across a lovely shop that specialized in all products travel. I loved that they look like mini steamer trunks! Down to the little handle detail on the spine and the map print on each page. Now available in 4 colours: - 12/003A: Brown Brown cover with light beige trimming and gold detail. Brown striped end-paper with faintly brown printed pages - 12/003B: Dark Blue Dark blue cover with beige trimming and silver detail. Blue striped end-paper and faintly blue printed pages - 12/003C: White White cover with brown trimming and gold detail. Red striped end-paper and faintly red printed pages - 12/003D: Orange Orange cover with brown trimming and gold detail. Orange striped end-paper and faintly orange printed pages .: Notebook is 18.8cmH x 13.3cmW x 2cmD .: Cover is made of PU leather and comes with a ribbon bookmark .: 208 sheets with perfect binding .: 1 sheet with 14 matt travel-related stickers for decoration .: Pocket in the back

name: 11/031B: Scratch Map (Travel)
description: They say a journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. We say it begins with a single scratch! Pack this miniature travel version in your backpack and mark off all the places you've visited with this fun Scratch Map! Covered in gold foil, you can scratch off the foil with a coin to reveal the coloured countries beneath, and display your various destinations to the world! Many extra goodies and activities you can carry out with this map, including tips and general factoids on visiting various countries, as well as an additional blank map and boxes on the reverse side where you can document how you travelled from place to place. Find out more about the Scratch Map here. Or check out this video by Flight001 here .: Size: Small* 42cmW x 21.9 cmH *Larger version available here .: Map is printed on glossy paper (both sides) .: Front includes detailed coloured world map with gold foil printed over them for you to scratch off (handle with care!) .: Comes rolled up in a cardboard tube approx 13.5cm long and 5cm diameter

name: 11/008: Wintercheck Factory: William Wallet
description:
Frustrated with bulging pockets and overflowing purses? The William Wallet is the perfect way for you to practice a minimalist lifestyle and streamline your life. It's a great travel companion that lets you keep your essentials close at hand discreetly, leaving you hands-free to enjoy your travels. Both stylish and practical, it's a much more fashionable alternative to money clips. We guarantee the boys (and the girls too) will love it! These wallets have proven so popular that they're back now in more colours then before! Find out more about the William Wallet from my post or from here. The William Wallet is available in many colours with different combinations of band colours, so there's definitely something for everyone. As they are made in limited quantity, TOTshop remains the last place for you to get some of these pieces! BLACK or WHITE (GLOSS) The coloured bands really pop against the glossy black or white surfaces. These classic colours are great for both formal and casual settings.
  • 11/030C - Black (Gloss) w White Tracer Band
  • 11/030C - Black (Gloss) w Blue Band
  • 12/001C - Black (Gloss) w Black Band **LAST PIECE**
  • 12/001H - White (Gloss) w Black Band
  • 12/001I - White (Gloss) w Red Band
POP COLOURS Sometimes we just wanna have some fun, and these various pop colours are definitely eye-catching and a great accessory for the more daring and hip.
  • 11/008B - Hunter Green (Gloss) w Black Band
  • 11/008C - Orange (Gloss) w White Band **LAST PIECE**
  • 12/001E - Dark Blue (Gloss) w Black Band
  • 12/001F - Dark Blue (Gloss) w Red Band **LAST PIECE**
  • 12/001G - Dark Blue (Gloss) w Tracer Band **LAST PIECE**
.: 10cmW x 7cmH .: 2 powdered Aluminum Plates bound by a 1/8" rubber cord with a notch on both sides for easy access to center .: Subtle WC.FACT. stamped into bottom left corner on metal plates .: Self compressing design makes it easy to slide into fitting pockets while rubber cord is tight and holds your items snugly
More pictures of William Wallets here SOLD OUT (These colours were once available but no longer are... check out the available colours on the right)
  • Black Moon (Textured) w Black Band
  • Black (Gloss) w Red Band
  • Industrial Scratch w Black Band
  • Industrial Scratch w White Tracer Band
  • Industrial Scratch w Red Band
  • Industrial Scratch w Navy Band
  • Industrial Scratch w White Band
  • Hybrid Black
  • Hybrid Red
  • Hybrid Blue
  • Hybrid Yellow
  • Yellow Gloss
  • Blue Gloss
  • Red Gloss
  • Matt Black

name: 11/032: alter:sg Singapore Travel Guide
description: alter:sg believes in redefining the ordinary. There is nothing out of the ordinary about this small island of 704km2. But it is the places and people who acknowledge and delight in this that show us there is inspiration waiting to be discovered, scenes ready to be reinterpreted in the everyday. For an alternative look at Singapore past its 'Fine' city and clean corporate image, alter:sg is an independent travel guide to showcase an alternative side to lifestyle in Singapore. Conceived by a group of individuals, it showcases a mix of people and places from the fun to the cool to the overlooked and underappreciated. alter:sg invites you, local or tourist alike, to get out there and (re)discover this little island. .: A5, 80 pages, Full colour .: Fully printed on recycled material .: Enclosed with A4 fold-out map

name: 11/027: Plastique*: Pyramids Ring
description: This mini version of the Egyptian Pyramids will get you daydreaming of romantic desert tours and sandy vistas. Possibly camels too. Designed as a unique 2-finger ring, this rendition of the pyramids is simple and modern and will go with practically anything you wear! .: Ring can be worn over any 2 fingers except for the thumb .: Comes in 3 sizes: - Small (Size 5 and 6) - Medium (Size 7 and 8) - Large (Size 9 and 10) .: 3mm Black Acrylic Plastic - Fragile! Handle with care! .: Pyramids protrude 1.7cm above finger and are 5cm across .: Etched detail of pyramids on one side of the ring More about Plastique* Plastique* is created by Jen Murse, an American designer with a beautiful range of laser cut acrylic jewelry. The Seasoned Traveler range is inspired by her passion for world famous skylines, these accessories are both modern and minimalist, and definitely make you stand out in a crowd! See the full Plastique storehere

name: 11/026: Plastique*: Bridge Rings
description: This unusual ring puts the iconic San Francisco and London bridges atop your knuckles and all it takes is a glance at your hands while you're typing at your desk or having a meal to let you start dreaming of visiting the real deal. Available in 2 designs: - Golden Gate Bridge (Red only) - Tower Bridge (Black only) .: The ring is meant for 3 fingers - 1 in the small hole and 2 in the large hole. You can wear it across any of the fingers except the thumb .: Comes in 3 sizes: - Small (Small Hole - Size 5, Large Hole - Sizes 6-7) - Medium (Small Hole - Size 7, Large Hole - Sizes 8-9) - Large (Small Hole - Size 9, Large Hole - Sizes 10-11) * From my own personal experience, get the size to fit the finger that will go into the small hole. It's ok if the big hole is a bit loose as I find it more comfortable for those fingers to have a little wiggle room .: 3mm Black Acrylic Plastic - Fragile! Handle with care! .: Tower Bridge protrudes 1.7cm above fingers while Golden Gate Bridge protrudes 2.2cm More about Plastique* Plastique* is created by Jen Murse, an American designer with a beautiful range of laser cut acrylic jewelry. The Seasoned Traveler range is inspired by her passion for world famous skylines, these accessories are both modern and minimalist, and definitely make you stand out in a crowd! See the full Plastique storehere

name: 11/023: Geografia Pangaea Puzzle Board
description:
Here's a jigsaw puzzle that's both educational and so, so pretty! It's based on German geophysicist Wegener's theory on Continental Drift - that the earth used to be 1 piece of land mass known as Pangaea, that gradually drifted into the continental masses that they are today. You can piece together history for yourself with this beautiful puzzle bord, with 1 side of the board showing Pangaea, and the other side of the board displaying the modern world map. 2 colours available: - Brown - continent pieces are all brown for a minimalist zen feel - Colourful - continent pieces are multicoloured for a more upbeat .: Puzzle board is 45cmW x 33cmH .: 9 pieces of puzzle, 25.5cmW x 22cmH when put together More about Geografia Designed and produced in Japan, Geografia uses topography, geography and maps as themes to create exquisite and unusual stationery and display products that allow you to truly appreciate the earth’s configurations. Geografia products make perfect gifts for the person looking for something unusual yet chic, or anyone who just appreciates beautiful paper products.
More pictures of Geografia Products here

name: 11/022: Geografia Pangaea Greeting Card
description:
Connect with your loved ones and educate them at the same time with this creative puzzle greeting card. Based on German geophysicist Wegener's theory on Continental Drift - that the earth used to be 1 piece of land mass known as Pangaea, that gradually drifted into the continental masses that they are today - this is both a postcard and a jigsaw puzzle. Put the pieces back together to write and read the message, and see how the pieces come apart to form the modern map, with a handy paper map. 2 colours available: - Brown - continent pieces are all brown for a minimalist zen feel - Colourful - continent pieces are multicoloured for a more upbeat .: Comes in pack 22cmW x 27cmH with .: 10 pieces of puzzle, 25.5cmW x 22cmH when put together .: Comes with plain cream envelope 18.5cmW x 12cmH with small Geografia blind debossed on envelope flap .: Comes with additional paper map sheet 22.7cmW x 34cmH when opened More about Geografia Designed and produced in Japan, Geografia uses topography, geography and maps as themes to create exquisite and unusual stationery and display products that allow you to truly appreciate the earth’s configurations. Geografia products make perfect gifts for the person looking for something unusual yet chic, or anyone who just appreciates beautiful paper products.
More pictures of Geografia Products here

name: 11/021: Geografia City Ring Note Books
description:
If you travel to other cities a lot, you realize that no 2 cities are alike, from the types of buildngs they have to the way the roads are laid out, and that is reflected here in the Geografia City Ring Note Books, which showcases 4 different city plans on its cover. Not content to just have a beautiful design, innovative printing techniques are employed to bring the city plans to life - the roads are carefully embossed while the rivers have shiny UV screen printing, giving this notebook a chic and fancy feel. 4 different cities are available, each with a different paper design inspired the city plan's aesthetic: - Kyoto (3mm Grid) *SOLD OUT* In the 8th century, the Emperor Kwanmu relocated the ancient capital from Nagaokakyo to Heiankyo; the land was selected based on Chinese Feng Shui, while the roads of the city were laid out in a grid with Suzaku Boulevard at the center. - Washington (6mm Lined) *SELLING FAST* The capital city of the United States of America, and hub of the federal government legislative, administrative and judiciary authorities. It is a man-made city painstakingly planned by French engineer Pierre Charles L’Enfant; while being the center of politics, the cityscape has an abundance of greenery, and is called the “park city”. - Brasilia (Blank) A man-made city that took 3 years to carve from unexplored land in 1956. The distinctive project, with its motif of the fuselage of a plane, was participated in by the urbanologist Lucio Costa and architect Oscar Niemeyer. In 1960, the capital was relocated from Rio di Janeiro; Brasilia was registered as a world heritage site in 1987. - Canberra (10mm Dotted) A man-made city planned by the architect Burley Griffin, who won the capital city design competition; in the middle of the city lies a lake named after him − Lake Burley Griffin. .: Sheets are 18cmW x 23cmH .: 70 sheets, White ring bound along 23cm edge * Descriptions of cities taken from geo-grafia.jp More about Geografia Designed and produced in Japan, Geografia uses topography, geography and maps as themes to create exquisite and unusual stationery and display products that allow you to truly appreciate the earth’s configurations. Geografia products make perfect gifts for the person looking for something unusual yet chic, or anyone who just appreciates beautiful paper products.
More pictures of Geografia Products here

name: 11/020: Geografia Rice Terrace Notebooks
description:
Imagine the earth from the air - these hilly rice terraces in handy notebook form will surely make you push aside your mountain of paperwork and get you planning that next trip! These handy notebooks - with 7 convenient tabs make it easy for you to group information and make idea travel journals! Available in 2 different colours and designs - Brown (Curvy) - Grey (Hexagons) Find out more about the Geografia Rice Terrace Ring Notehere .: Sheets are 21cmW, and range in size from 13cmL-21cmL .: 119 sheets, White ring bound along 21cm edge .: Brown - 8mm 'lined' with green '-', curved edges .: Grey - 5mm 'dotted' with mini green '+', rounded edges More about Geografia Designed and produced in Japan, Geografia uses topography, geography and maps as themes to create exquisite and unusual stationery and display products that allow you to truly appreciate the earth’s configurations. Geografia products make perfect gifts for the person looking for something unusual yet chic, or anyone who just appreciates beautiful paper products.
More pictures of Geografia Products here

name: 11/017: Geografia Altitude Memo Pads
description:
If you've ever admired the accidental art that topography maps provide, you'll love the Geografia memo pads. Inspired by the various contour lines, this memo pad is a mini topography map come to life on your desktop. Have one on its own or join up the 4 different designs to make your own mini mountain range! Your unique stationery will be the envy of any office, and it's almost too pretty write on... For paper and printing fans, this pad is created with a special inline die-cut printing and embossing process, where the die-cutting, printing and embossing are carried out all at once... wow! Available in 4 different colours - Brown [PATTERN B SOLD OUT] - Black - Green - White Find out more about the Geografia Altitude Memo Padshere .: 200 sheets in 4 sizes. The memo pad is 11.5cmL x 7.5cmW x 1.5cmH .: Comes in 4 topogaphical designs (A, B, C, D) that match up when lined up together .: Each layer is labelled with a number - 50, 100, 150 and 200, which also denotes the number of sheets .: Individual sheets are blank and held together by a large staple More about Geografia Designed and produced in Japan, Geografia uses topography, geography and maps as themes to create exquisite and unusual stationery and display products that allow you to truly appreciate the earth’s configurations. Geografia products make perfect gifts for the person looking for something unusual yet chic, or anyone who just appreciates beautiful paper products.
More pictures of Geografia Products here

White - Set of 4 (A, B, C, D)

name: 11/015: Geografia Twistable Globe
description:
See the earth from space, or view space from the earth - this unusual cube shaped globe combines the best of the land and sky and is both globe and constellation chart. Made of 8 separate sheets assembled into a magic cube, the most addictive thing is flipping the cubes from globe side to constellation side and back again endlessly. Find out more about the Geografia Twistable Globe here .: 10cmH x 10cmW x 10cmD when assembled .: Comes in a flat pack 25cmW x 25cmH .: 8 sheets made of paper, handle with care when assembling .: Assembly of the globe is required – instructions are provided ( it's more complicated than the usual globes, but still managable!), and the assembly is part of what makes the Geografia globe unique More about Geografia Designed and produced in Japan, Geografia uses topography, geography and maps as themes to create exquisite and unusual stationery and display products that allow you to truly appreciate the earth’s configurations. Geografia products make perfect gifts for the person looking for something unusual yet chic, or anyone who just appreciates beautiful paper products.
More pictures of Geografia Globes here

name: 11/014: Geografia 3D Globe
description:
This stunning globe exudes minimalist zen from far, but up close, you can see the black continents floating in the grey sea - using an original pattern and lens with silk printing 3D printing technology, the continents appear to be raised up. It's not so obvious from the pictures, but the 3D effect is really quite cool in person! It's 3D, without the glasses or intense staring! Find out more about the Geografia 3D Globe here .: Medium size – 20cmH x 20cmW x 20cmD when assembled .: Geosphere sheets are made of plastic (polypropylene) with 3D printing on the surface .: Comes in a flat pack – 30cmH x 30cmW .: Assembly of the globe is required – instructions are provided and it’s very easy (took me about 20 minutes the first time I assembled it), and the assembly is part of what makes the Geografia globe unique More about Geografia Globes Designed and produced in Japan, the Geografia Sectional Globes allow you to truly experience the earth’s configuration. Exquisite detail has gone into the design of the Geografia Globe – it is precisely angled at 23.4 degrees when sitting on a flat surface, the same tilt of the earth’s axis. Attention has been paid right down to the core structure of the globe, labelled like the inner core of the earth, so pretty you can even leave out a piece to show off the inner structure. Not just a work of art, these globes also make great educational tools for the young or the geography-geek in you. These unique globes would look right at home on any study table or designer mantelpiece. It comes flat-packed for easy shipping and is easily assembled. The perfect gift for any globe enthusiast looking for something unusual yet chic, or anyone who appreciates beautiful paper products.
More pictures of Geografia Globes here

name: 11/006: Crumpled City Maps
description:
Maps are pretty essential when you’re in a foreign place, especially when you don’t speak the language and you’re trying to find your way around. But after awhile, your oft-used map gets folder and unfolded, and torn and dog-eared, and pretty soon you’re just carrying around a rather bruised looking piece of paper. Designed by Emanuele Pizzolorusso, a young Helsinki based industrial designer, the Crumpled City Map is made to be crushed and manhandled. Made of trusty Tyvek®, it’s 100% waterproof and 100% recyclable, and you can squash this map into your pocket, bag or the accompanying pouch in 2 seconds flat without worrying about spoiling your map. The Crumpled City Map is a handy size, and also provides details about a large part of the city, including streets, monuments, museums, art galleries and also includes a sightseeing index and a list of unique "Soulsights". Each map comes in a box with a carrying pouch, with a different graphic motif on it representative of the corresponding city. Remember to crush the map before use (I couldn’t quite bear to at first! But after I did I could not stop balling that thing up!) and enjoy the satisfaction of being able to scrunch something up without spoiling it. The Crumpled City Map makes a great gift for anyone headed to a major city for a period of time, or for any design savvy traveller who likes to have a pretty map on hand. Check out the Crumpled City Map on the Palomar website and on Cool Hunting. The Crumpled City map is available for 10 major cities! - 11/006C - Rome (Italy) - 11/006D - New York (USA) - 11/006E - Berlin (Germany) - 11/006F - Hamburg (Germany) - 11/006G – Amsterdam (Netherlands) - 11/006H – Milan (Italy) - 11/006I – Barcelona (Spain) - 11/006J – Lisbon (Portugal) - 11/006K – Sydney (Australia) - 11/006L – Tokyo (Japan) .: Map is 87cmW x 58cmH and weighs just 20g .: Map comes folded in box 11.5cmW x 15cmH x 2.5cmD with accompanying Tyvek drawstring carrying pouch 13cmW x 13.5cmH when stretched out CRUMPLED CITY MAPS BOX SET Here's a great way to gift or store the Crumpled City Maps, to yourself or to your loved ones! Just pick 5 of your favourite maps and it'll come in this specially packed box set at just $90! Please indicate the 5 maps that you want in the paypal order.
More pictures of crumpled city maps here SOLD OUT: - Paris - London

name: 11/005: Mighty Wallet
description: For those who like more conventional wallets, the Mighty Wallet is a great option. The Tyvek® material makes the Mighty Wallet pretty much able to handle anything you throw its way, whether you need to stuff it to its brim or it starts to rain, the tear-resistant and water-resistant material is slim, lightweight and very strong. The Mighty Wallet also has an ‘origami construction’ which is stitch-less, with 2 bill pockets and 4 other pockets to put cards in. I received one as a gift some time back, and it has proved pretty tough. I love that the 2 bill pockets keeps my local and foreign currency separate, while the various pockets makes it easy to segregate my various credit and transport cards. Available in 3 fun travel inspired designs: 11/005B - Airmail The familiar red and blue stripe design is a classic and so recognizable. If you ever loved receiving post in the mail Par Avion, you’ll love to own this Mighty Wallet. 11/005A - Inflight This design takes inspiration from the inflight safety manuals found in airplanes. From the outside to the pockets, this cute wallet is covered all over with the safety graphics and is my favourite of the lot of Mighty Wallets. 11/005C - Explorer Incite the wanderlust in yourself - enjoy the beautiful map of the Alaskan region on this Mighty Wallet and inspire yourself to explore the unknown. Find out more about the Mighty Wallet from The Occasional Traveller Shop page here or the Dynomighty page here.

name: 11/004: Mighty Tags
description:
* * * * * NOTE TO BUYERS: For all orders, please indicate in the paypal checkout 'Instructions to Merchant" the designs and quantities that you wish to purchase when you make payment. Or drop me an email separately at theoccasionaltraveller at gmail.com Updated 30 Jan: Restocks! All available except Mine Not Yours and Passport, and new design NY Subway available! Pictures for reference only, not all available at this point. If you wish to place a specific order, please contact me and let me know first! * * * * * If you’ve ever been at the baggage carousel, you know that 90% of the bags there are black or dark blue. Even though I know how my luggage looks like, half the time I’m boggled because all the bags look the SAME. So you try to differentiate your bag - by tying a ribbon or an airline paper tag on your bag, but baggage handlers aren’t the most gentle and often those tags go missing and then you’re back at square one scanning the carousel in confusion. Mighty Tags made out of Tyvek® are tough, and whether you use them once or forever, they’re definitely not going to fall off your bag. You can also write on them in permanent marker to further personalize your tags. Mighty Tags are available in several designs:
  • 11/004A - GRAFFITI: Street style with a graffiti defaced wall
  • 11/004C - HELLO MY NAME IS: You can't lose your bag with this well labeled piece!
  • 11/004D - TALK: Fun speech bubbles you can fill in yourself
  • 11/004E - AIRMAIL: Reminiscent of old school par avion envelopes
  • 11/004F - VACATION: Do not disturb the vacationer! You could even hang this on your door...
  • 11/004G - FRAGILE: No one will dare to drop a bag tagged with this bright red tag!
.: 22cm long and 6.3cm wide when folded, 32.5cm long when fully extended .: Made of Tyvek® material, with a hole for slotting on one end .: Printed on both sides, sometimes with a different design While normally they’re available in packs of 10, this time you have the chance to mix and match, so you can get different designs for different tastes! Please email me at theoccasionaltraveller@gmail.com or indicate in the paypal checkout 'Instructions to Merchant" the designs and quantities that you wish to purchase when you make your order.
More pictures of mighty tags here OUT OF STOCK
  • Mine Not Yours
  • Passport
  • NY Subway

name: 10/005: Geografia Night Globe
description:
Imagine seeing the earth from outer space - it's dark, it's quiet, and the only signs of life are all the twinkly little lights - the theme of this globe is earth by night, and the various points of lights have been recreated faithfully from satellite photos, letting you drift off into sleep with dreams of floating in space. Find out more about the Geografia Night Globe here .: Medium size – 20cmH x 20cmW x 20cmD when assembled .: Geosphere sheets are made of transparent plastic (polypropylene). Luminous ink is used to create the glow-in-the-dark effect .: Comes in a flat pack – 30cmH x 30cmW .: Assembly of the globe is required – instructions are provided and it’s very easy (took me about 20 minutes the first time I assembled it), and the assembly is part of what makes the Geografia globe unique More about Geografia Globes Designed and produced in Japan, the Geografia Sectional Globes allow you to truly experience the earth’s configuration. Exquisite detail has gone into the design of the Geografia Globe – it is precisely angled at 23.4 degrees when sitting on a flat surface, the same tilt of the earth’s axis. Attention has been paid right down to the core structure of the globe, labelled like the inner core of the earth, so pretty you can even leave out a piece to show off the inner structure. Not just a work of art, these globes also make great educational tools for the young or the geography-geek in you. These unique globes would look right at home on any study table or designer mantelpiece. It comes flat-packed for easy shipping and is easily assembled. The perfect gift for any globe enthusiast looking for something unusual yet chic, or anyone who appreciates beautiful paper products.
More pictures of Geografia Globes here

name: 10/004: Geografia Globe: Material Series
description:
The Material Series Globes are a special themed series, with each globe taking on a different global theme and utilizing special printing methods and materials to highlight these themes. A compact size, these globes fit nicely on any tabletop or study display and dress it up instantly. Find out more about the Geografia Material Series Globes here. Geografia Material Series Globes are available in: METAL or MINERAL It takes reference from minerals that make up and can be found all over the world. Shiny, metallic textured paper further underscores the Metal theme. Special UV ink used on the latitude/longtitudes appears and disappears depending on the amount of light shining on it LEATHER Leather, or the texture of animals makes up this theme. The geosphere sheets are made of paper with a leathery texture and the animal motifs have a glossy sheen .: Small size – 14cmH x 14cmW x 14cmD when assembled .: Comes in a flat pack – 30cmH x 20cmW .: Assembly of the globe is required – instructions are provided and it’s very easy (took me about 20 minutes the first time I assembled it) More about Geografia Globes Designed and produced in Japan, the Geografia Sectional Globes allow you to truly experience the earth’s configuration. Exquisite detail has gone into the design of the Geografia Globe – it is precisely angled at 23.4 degrees when sitting on a flat surface, the same tilt of the earth’s axis. Attention has been paid right down to the core structure of the globe, labelled like the inner core of the earth, so pretty you can even leave out a piece to show off the inner structure. Not just a work of art, these globes also make great educational tools for the young or the geography-geek in you. These unique globes would look right at home on any study table or designer mantelpiece. It comes flat-packed for easy shipping and is easily assembled. The perfect gift for any globe enthusiast looking for something unusual yet chic, or anyone who appreciates beautiful paper products.
[OUT OF STOCK] WOOD A theme that encompasses trees and forests and greenery. It's wood-like texture and forestry recreated through an incredible 8-colour printing process (your standard is 4!) More pictures of Geografia Globes here

name: 10/003: Geografia Globe: Blank Series
description:
Where have you been, and where will you go? What better way to spark the wanderlust then with the beautiful Geografia Globe. Designed and produced in Japan, the Geografia Blank series of globes provides an outlined world map so you can fill in the map with any colours or details that you choose to. Find out more about the Geografia Blank Series Globes here. Geografia Blank Series Globes are available in 3 natural colours: WHITE Colour is slightly off-white with a yellowish tint BROWN or BEIGE Colour is a jotter book/kraft paper brown GREY Colour is like your typical grey cardboard backing Now available in 2 sizes: - Large (White, Grey, Brown) - Medium (White only) Large Size .: Globe is 26cmH x 26cmW x 26cmD when assembled .: Comes in a flat pack – 36cmH x 36cmW Medium Size .: Globe is 20cmH x 20cmW x 20cmD when assembled .: Comes in a flat pack – 30cmH x 30cmW .: Assembly of the globe is required – instructions are provided and it’s very easy (took me about 20 minutes the first time I assembled it), and the assembly is part of what makes the Geografia globe unique .: Geosphere sheets are made of paper suitable for colouring on with colour pencils or markers .: Map is printed on both sides – 1 side is in English, the other in Japanese – assemble whichever way you prefer! More about Geografia Globes Designed and produced in Japan, the Geografia Sectional Globes allow you to truly experience the earth’s configuration. Exquisite detail has gone into the design of the Geografia Globe – it is precisely angled at 23.4 degrees when sitting on a flat surface, the same tilt of the earth’s axis. Attention has been paid right down to the core structure of the globe, labelled like the inner core of the earth, so pretty you can even leave out a piece to show off the inner structure. Not just a work of art, these globes also make great educational tools for the young or the geography-geek in you. These unique globes would look right at home on any study table or designer mantelpiece. It comes flat-packed for easy shipping and is easily assembled. The perfect gift for any globe enthusiast looking for something unusual yet chic, or anyone who appreciates beautiful paper products.
